dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] SERVICE MARK "TRUCKADS" AND TRADEMARK "TRUCK ADS" - madisonmobilemedia.
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page www.madisonmobilemedia.com/ any
of the material that you claim is being infringed as of 2:58:32 p.m.
(GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com  

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Friday, April 28, 2006 1:16 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] SERVICE MARK "TRUCKADS" AND TRADEMARK "TRUCK
ADS" - madisonmobilemedia.com]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] SERVICE MARK "TRUCKADS" AND TRADEMARK "TRUCK ADS"
- madisonmobilemedia.com]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] SERVICE MARK "TRUCKADS" AND TRADEMARK "TRUCK
ADS" -
madisonmobilemedia.com
Date:         Fri, 28 Apr 2006 11:43:45 -0400
From:         Rod Harris <rodharris@truckads.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         kevin@madisonprint.com



_2ND NOTICE TO MADISONMOBILEMEDIA.COM - TRANSMITTED 4/28/06_

ATTN: THEPLANET.COM

I AM SENDING A COPY OF THIS TO YOU BECAUSE YOUR CLIENT IS INFRINGING ON
OUR TRADEMARKS. AS YOU KNOW, AN ISP IS LIABLE FOR CONTRIBUTORY
INFRINGEMENT IF, AFTER NOTICE, THEY REFUSE TO REMOVE THE INFRINGING
CONTENT. PER YOUR WEBSITE POLICY AT
http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html PLEASE ADVISE YOUR CUSTOMER TO
REMOVE THE INFRINGING CONTENT OR DISABLE THE PAGES THAT ARE INFRINGING
ON OUR MARKS IMMEDIATELY. THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR FULL COOPERATION
IN THIS SERIOUS MATTER.

(NOTE: WILLFUL INFRINGEMENT OF A TRADEMARK REGISTERED WITH THE US
TRADEMARK OFFICE CREATES LIABILITY FOR PENALTY DAMAGES OF $150,000, AND
RECOVERY OF ATTORNEY FEES AND COSTS.)

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

- -----Original Message-----
*From:* Rod Harris [mailto:rodharris@truckads.com]
*Sent:* Tuesday, April 25, 2006 8:28 AM
*To:* 'Kevin Chiles (kevin@madisonprint.com)'
*Subject:* SERVICE MARK "TRUCKADS" AND TRADEMARK "TRUCK ADS" -
madisonmobilemedia.com

Dear Mr. Chiles:

We are requesting that you cease and desist all use of the term TRUCK
ADS and TRUCKADS and confusingly similar terms TRUCK AD and TRUCKAD
because it is infringing on our trademarks. This claim of trademark
infringement is in accordance with the federally established Digital
Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA).

The SERVICE MARK: TRUCKADS (Reg.2838348) and TRADEMARK: TRUCK ADS
(Reg.3027883) are claimed to be infringed.

The name, post office address and telephone number of the owner of the
marks identified above are as follows:

TRUCK ADS, LLC
2028 VIRGINIA AVENUE
MCLEAN, VA 22101
PH: 703-538-6711

The goods and services covered by or offered under the marks identified
above are as follows:

Word Mark TRUCK ADS
Goods and Services IC 016. US 002 005 022 023 029 037 038 050. G & S:
VINYL ADHESIVE DECALS AND FITTED STRETCH VINYL DECALS APPLIED TO THE
EXTERIOR SIDES OF CARS, TRUCKS AND MOTORIZED VEHICLES. FIRST USE:
19960207. FIRST USE IN COMMERCE: 19960613

Word Mark TRUCKADS
Goods and Services IC 035. US 100 101 102. G & S: advertising and public
relations services, namely, the rental of advertising space on trucks,
taxi's and internet web sites. FIRST USE: 19960207. FIRST USE IN
COMMERCE: 19960207

The date of first use of the marks identified above is FEBRUARY 7, 1996.

The date of first use in interstate commerce of the marks identified
above is JUNE 13, 1996 and FEBRUARY 7, 1996 respectively.

The mark the Complaining Party, TRUCK ADS, LLC believes is an
infringement of its marks is TRUCK ADS, TRUCK AD, TRUCK-AD, TRUCK-ADS,
TRUCKAD and TRUCKADS.

The goods and services covered by or offered under the marks claimed to
be infringing are as follows:

Word Mark TRUCK ADS
Goods and Services IC 016. US 002 005 022 023 029 037 038 050. G & S:
VINYL ADHESIVE DECALS AND FITTED STRETCH VINYL DECALS APPLIED TO THE
EXTERIOR SIDES OF CARS, TRUCKS AND MOTORIZED VEHICLES. FIRST USE:
19960207. FIRST USE IN COMMERCE: 19960613

Word Mark TRUCKADS
Goods and Services IC 035. US 100 101 102. G & S: advertising and public
relations services, namely, the rental of advertising space on trucks,
taxi's and internet web sites. FIRST USE: 19960207. FIRST USE IN
COMMERCE: 19960207

The precise location of the marks that are claimed to be infringing are
on the following page:
http://www.madisonmobilemedia.com/

THE INFRINGING TERMS ARE CONTAINED IN THE HTML CODE OF THE PAGE AS
FOLLOWS:
<META NAME="keywords" CONTENT="truck ad,truck
ads,truck-ad,truck-ads,truckad,truckads">
<META name="abstract" content="truckad, truck-ad, truck ads, truckads,
truck-ads, truck ad">

This is a good faith certification, signed under penalty of perjury that
the mark TRUCK ADS, TRUCK AD, TRUCK-AD, TRUCK-ADS, TRUCKAD and TRUCKADS
infringes the rights of TRUCK ADS, LLC who owns the marks TRUCKADS and
TRUCK ADS and that the use of the marks TRUCK ADS and TRUCKADS is not
authorized by us and is not defensible. The above information is true
and I am authorized to act on behalf of the trademark owner.

If the infringing terms are not removed by COB Wednesday 4/26/06, this
notification will be forwarded to your hosting company.


Regards... Rod





Rod Harris
CEO

****************************************
TRUCK ADS, LLC
http://www.truckads.com
2028 Virginia Avenue
McLean, Virginia  22101

(800) 895 - 1341 (Corporate - North America)
(703) 538 - 6711 (Corporate - Worldwide)
(703) 538 - 6712 (Corporate - Fax)
1-800-TRUCKADS (Affiliates - North America)
